entry.title: Combined summary - Suggestion: Dynamic block size that updates like difficulty
entry.summary: A new subscriber to a mailing list has raised a question about the feasibility of having a dynamic block size limit that changes with difficulty. The subscriber proposed that the size of the block should not exceed two times the mean size of the previous difficulty period. The author of the post acknowledged that this topic might have already been discussed on the mailing list, but no further information was provided regarding the specific topic or the mailing list itself.
